00042 ElementMaxQM::ElementMaxQM( ElemSampleQM* metric )
00043     : mMetric(metric)
00044     {}
00045     
00046 ElementMaxQM::~ElementMaxQM() {}
00047 
00048 std::string ElementMaxQM::get_name() const
00049 {
00050   std::string result("ElementMaxQM(");
00051   result += mMetric->get_name();
00052   result += ")";
00053   return result;
00054 }

00057 int ElementMaxQM::get_negate_flag() const
00058 {
00059   return get_quality_metric()->get_negate_flag();
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool ElementMaxQM::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00063                               size_t handle, 
00064                               double& value, 
00065                               MsqError& err )
00066 {
00067   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00068   mHandles.clear();
00069   qm->get_element_evaluations( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00070 
00071   bool valid = true;
00072   double tmpval;
00073   bool tmpvalid;
00074 
00075   value = -1.e+100; // initialize max computation
00076   for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator h = mHandles.begin(); h != mHandles.end(); ++h) { 
00077     tmpvalid = qm->evaluate( pd, *h, tmpval, err );  // MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00078     if (!tmpvalid)
00079     {
00080       value = +1.e+100;
00081       return false;   // if any handle within the element makes tmpvalid false, then valid is false, no matter what the other handles say
00082     }
00083     else if (tmpval > value)
00084       value = tmpval;
00085   }
00086 
00087   return valid;
00088 }
00089 /*
00090 bool ElementMaxQM::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd, 
00091                                             size_t handle, 
00092                                             double& value, 
00093                                             std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00094                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00095                                             MsqError& err )
00096 {
00097   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00098   mHandles.clear();
00099   qm->get_element_evaluations( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00100 
00101   bool valid = true;
00102   double tmpval;
00103   bool tmpvalid;
00104   unsigned count = 0;
00105   std::vector<size_t>::iterator h, i, j;
00106 
00107   value = -std::numeric_limits<double>::maximum();
00108   for (h = mHandles.begin(); h != mHandles.end(); ++h) {
00109     mIndices.clear();
00110     mGrad.clear();
00111     tmpvalid = qm->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *h, tmpval, mIndices, mGrad, err );
00112     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00113     if (!tmpvalid) {
00114       valid = false;
00115     }
00116       // new value greater than previous max value
00117     else if (tmpval - value > 1e-6) {
00118       indices = mIndices;
00119       gradient = mGrad;
00120       count = 1;
00121       value = tmpval;
00122     }
00123       // new value equal to previous max value
00124     else if (tmpval - value >= -1e-6) {
00125       ++count;
00126       for (i = mIndices.begin(); i != mIndices.end(); ++i) {
00127         j = std::find( indices.begin(), indices.end(), *i );
00128         if (j == indices.end()) {
00129           indices.push_back( *i );
00130           gradient.push_back( mGrad[i - mIndices.begin()] );
00131         }
00132         else {
00133           gradient[j - indices.begin()] += mGrad[i - mIndices.begin()];
00134         }
00135       }
00136     }
00137   }
00138   if (count > 1) {
00139     const double inv_count = 1.0 / count;
00140     for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g = gradient.begin(); g != gradient.end(); ++g)
00141       *g *= inv_count;
00142   }
00143     
00144   return valid;
00145 }
